Text: Viruses? How, I got these from the original places in steamapps and common folders. There are no viruses in them.
I'm going to check for viruses if there are seeders for this.

This is what I found: W32/Parite-B
Description:
Once W32/Parite-B has been executed, it will remain in memory, infecting every PE and SCR file on every drive and network share.

Keeping AS anyway, just deleting the virus.

Oh, this has been a long time, I didn't know this back then, I may as well remove this torrent, you need a cracked steam, PacSteam for example to use it. And, you could just download it straight from the cracked steam. This torrent is useless. Sorry guys.
